Name: Four W Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The oomph of rum, the sourness of grapefruit and the richness of maple syrup, all aromatised by bitters.
History: My version of a vintage cocktail created by Herb Smith and popularised by his friend Oscar at the Waldorf in New York City. The drink was named in honour of the Duke of Windsor and his bride, formerly Wallis Warfield Simpson. The four 'W's stand for Wallis Warfield Windsor Wallop.
Nutrition: One serving of Four W Daiquiri contains 158 calories
